item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: :) They should put Google ads. Microsoft ads may crash.
item.content:encoded: :) They should put Google ads. Microsoft ads may crash.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: If they would have placed an add instead of writing something that no one reads, they could have earned some extra money and maybe buy youtube.
item.content:encoded: If they would have placed an add instead of writing something that no one reads, they could have earned some extra money and maybe buy youtube.
